meanings.definition: The state or quality of being corky.
meanings.sent1: The corkinesses of the tree bark made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: The corkinesses of the wine stopper gave it a unique feel.
meanings.sent3: The corkinesses of the old bulletin board made it look like a giant cork.
meanings.sent4: Her personality had a corkinesses that made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The corkinesses of the material made it float effortlessly on water.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a cork-like texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The table's corkinesses added a rustic touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: The corkinesses of the flooring made it comfortable to walk on.
meanings.sent3: The corkinesses of the hat made it look like a miniature cork.
meanings.sent4: The corkinesses of the wall gave the room a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The corkinesses of the handle provided a good grip for the bottle opener.
